summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the supplemental assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2462 for the improvement of Maynard Avenue from Weller Street to Plummer Street and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by replanking under Ordinance No. 26,518, under Ordinance No. 29558, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
